Terms and Conditions

MoneyMate - Terms and Conditions Effective Date: April 26, 2025 Welcome to MoneyMate! By using our mobile or web application ("App"), you agree to these Terms and Conditions ("Terms"). Please read them carefully before using MoneyMate.

1. Acceptance of Terms By creating an account or using MoneyMate in any way, you agree to be bound by these Terms and our Privacy Policy. If you do not agree, please do not use the App.
2. User Accounts You must provide accurate and complete information when creating an account. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password. You agree to notify us immediately if you suspect any unauthorized use of your account.
3. Use of the App MoneyMate is intended for personal finance tracking purposes only. You agree not to use MoneyMate for any illegal or unauthorized purposes. You may not misuse the App by introducing viruses, malware, or any other harmful technology. 4. Privacy Your privacy is very important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information. 5. Data Accuracy The financial records you enter into MoneyMate are your responsibility. We are not liable for any financial decisions you make based on information stored in the App. We do not provide financial, investment, or tax advice. 6. Intellectual Property All content, features, and functionality in MoneyMate are owned by MoneyMate and protected by international copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or create derivative works without our permission. 7. Termination We reserve the right to suspend or terminate your account if you violate these Terms. 8. Disclaimer of Warranties MoneyMate is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind, either express or implied. We do not guarantee that the App will always be available, error-free, or secure. 9. Limitation of Liability In no event shall MoneyMate or its creators be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of your use or inability to use the App. 10. Changes to Terms We may update these Terms from time to time. Changes will be posted in the App or on our website. Your continued use of MoneyMate after changes are made means you accept the new Terms. 11. Contact Us If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact us at: ðŸ“§ Email: support@moneymateapp.com
